alert.note: Alert for Searcy; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 2:16AM CST until February 22 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST FOR STONE...WESTERN INDEPENDENCE...IZARD...SOUTHEASTERN SEARCY... NORTHERN VAN BUREN AND SOUTHEASTERN BAXTER COUNTIES... At 215 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Culp to 6 miles east of Thola, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Melbourne... Horseshoe Bend... Calico Rock... Oxford... Pineville... Franklin... Lone Star... Wideman... Gid... Herpel... Lunenburg... Culp... Blanchard Springs Campground... Thola... Brandenberg... Croker... Gorby... Elba... Lacrosse... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
